@@ -53,0 +53,2 @@
+#include <sysinfoapi.h>
+
@@ -218,1 +220,1 @@
-    uint64_t    lastUpdate; // Last time query was updated (ticks)
+    uint64_t    lastUpdate; // Last time query was updated (millis)
@@ -221,1 +223,1 @@

+// Min time between query updates (millis)
@@ -996,1 +998,1 @@
-    clock_t now = clock();
+    uint64_t now = GetTickCount64();
